title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Beat the eggs with grated cheese.
Drain pasta, add pancetta and egg mixture.
Mix well and serve with extra cheese.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spice mix overnight.
Fry onions and add tomatoes to make sauce.
Blend sauce until smooth, add cream.
Add grilled chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
